Welcome to pygame2’s documentation!¶

Contents:

  • pygame2 package
    • Submodules
      • pygame2.color module
      • pygame2.rect module
    • Module contents

This is a new project. There have been others like it. We hope that we can be the first successful pygame2 project. You may be curious as to why there is documentation available for a project that hasn’t even reached its first minor version number? We want to make sure we establish a good development process early on so that we don’t scramble to “get it right” if and when the time comes that pygame2 catches on. We’ll have documentation, test coverage and continuous integration from day one.
